thread.section_title: DHgate 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 DHgate 的点评意见 | www.dhgate.com | 257 6
thread.title: Grayson Wolfe
thread.title_full: DHgate 的点评人 Grayson Wolfe

author: Grayson Wolfe
title: Grayson Wolfe
text: The shopping experience on DHGate is pretty good. The sellers are responsive and I've been satisfied with most of my purchases. They struggle with shipping and I have noticed that some sellers have long delays in the "time to ship" area. That, combined with distance and customs, can have you waiting for 1 to 2 months to get your order. DHGate should establish warehouse depots outside of China to reduce shipping times on the most popular products in each category.
